contributionDescription: Greetings badgeholders, requesting to receive RetroPGF for contributions toward the Optimism network such as trading on Optimism. This helps provide volume to the network. I am also requesting to receive RetroPGF for contributions toward delegating governance tokens.
impactDescription: The impact that my contributions had on the Optimism Collective, was providing volume to the network as a whole. I believe delegating governance tokens toward @OlimpioCrypto has played a role in growing the Optimism Collective. He provides great information and is a trusted source in bringing new users to networks.
pwFlaggedReason: Flagged because trading on Optimism and user interactions on OP chains that are part of the Superchain are not in scope to be rewarded in RetroPGF 3.
pwCategorySuggestions: Smart Contract Platforms, Governance & Tokens, Decentralized Finance (DeFi), User Experience & Adoption, Community Building
